name: Solitaire in Wonderland
description:
Solitaire in Wonderland is released now!

Enjoy the fun of eliminating all cards on the board by sorting the cards that have 1 more or less value than the targeted card. Also, challenge over 180 levels that have many exciting obstacles.

Over 10,000,000 of players are enjoying Solitaire in Wonderland on Facebook already and we are pretty sure that anyone can enjoy our game because it is simply-well interfaced on mobile.

You can compete with your friends by scoring more points in each levels. There are 180 levels on mobile version now and we will continually update over 400 levels that are running on Facebook.
